General.Name: Conduril - Engenharia S.A
General.Description: Conduril - Engenharia, S.A. executes civil engineering and public works in Portugal and internationally. It undertakes transport infrastructure; energy, environment, and hydraulic; maritime; building; and other projects. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Ermesinde, Portugal.
General.Address: Avenida Eng.º Duarte Pacheco, n.º 1835, Ermesinde, Portugal, 4445-416
